alert.note: Alert for Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 13 at 3:19AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Broward, Coastal Miami-Dade, Metro Broward and Metro Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of heavy rain will once again be possible through this evening. While showers and storms will be less widespread compared to yesterday, any additional rainfall over already saturated areas can lead to continued flooding concerns especially for poor drainage locations. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
